meanings.definition: The study of mosses, liverworts, and hornworts.
meanings.sent1: In bryologies, scientists learn about mosses and other small plants.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue bryologies to understand mosses better.
meanings.sent3: The bryologies class had a field trip to explore different types of mosses.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of bryologies lies in uncovering the secrets of tiny plants.
meanings.sent5: Through bryologies, one can appreciate the intricate world of mosses.

meanings.sent1: Researchers use bryologies to investigate bryophytes in detail.

meanings.sent3: The bryologies lab was filled with samples of various bryophytes.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bryologies, bryophytes hold many mysteries waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: Studying bryologies opens a window into the fascinating world of bryophytes.

meanings.definition: The branch of botany that deals with bryophytes.
meanings.sent1: Botanists specializing in bryologies focus on bryophytes.
meanings.sent2: Learning about bryologies helps understand the importance of bryophytes.
